framework.exception

Class ControlInterfaceException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • framework.exception.AbstractException
          • framework.exception.ControlInterfaceException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    WrongControlInterfaceStateException, WrongSystemStateException

    public class ControlInterfaceException
extends AbstractException
    Exception thrown when a control interface produces an error or uses invalid values.
    Author:
    Stefan Werner
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
